website_summaries.verdict: The Oxygym from La Sportiva is one of the brand’s many offerings that the climbing community appreciates deeply. It is well-liked for its comfy feel, breathable confines, and zero break-in time.However, this La Sportiva climbing shoe has a lot to prove in the area of sole durability. By and large, the Oxygym is a capable rock shoe that new and experienced climbers alike can be proud of wearing.
pros: The comfortable feel of the La Sportiva Oxygym is a delight to a majority of owners
Most wearers say that they appreciate its reasonable price
To a lot of users, the shoe's breathability is quite impressive
Many neophyte climbers testify that it is one of the best beginner-friendly rock shoes
It is easy to wear for long gym sessions, according to a portion of those who have used it on indoor climbs
Its no break-in period receives recognition from plenty of wearers
Less than a handful of patrons find the stickiness of this rock climbing shoe remarkable
cons: Its outsole comes off quickly, based on a decent number of reports
Very few have commented that this rock shoe from La Sportiva lacks a bit of sensitivity
The straps of the Oxygym tear easily, as testified by a couple of those who have used the shoe for only a few months

customer_reviews.title: Slightly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and washable, but they pinch a bit. I followed the side chart. I know they are supposed to be tight, but sometimes they pinch to the point where I get shooting pain in my feet or ankle. I also seem to always get blisters if I don't wear socks (which I know you are not supposed to). I will continue to break them in and update later.
customer_reviews.author: Aidia

customer_reviews.title: 7-7.5 Shoe: Ordered 38
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7-7.5 in street shoes and ordered the EU 38 in these. I absolutely love these climbing shoes. As a novice climber, it is difficult to get a good feel as to what feels "ideal" for a new shoe. I am certain they will stretch once I wear them a few times on the wall, but as of right now, when I stand, my toes are pretty uncomfortable. Other than that, the arch support and grip are wonderful! Every climber will tell you how uncomfortable a good climbing shoe can be at first. Therefore, I am giving these a bit to break in before I panic and purchase a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of these shoes, however the sizing seems to be off. I know climbing shoes are supposed to be tighter, but these were basically an entire size off compared to the chart. I am normally a W 6.5 maybe a 7 in normal shoes but when I ordered the 38, the US size on the tag in the shoe was a size 6. I just reordered according to the men’s sizing and I am hoping the 39 or men’s 6.5+ will be just right. I feel like just ignoring the woman’s size on the chart and just going off of the men’s and EU sizes will give you a more accurate size for the women’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Lucked out and got the correct size on these without trying them on!! I ordered a 7.5, which is my normal street shoe size..they must be already sized down. They fit perfect (snug, but not painful, tip of toe touches the front of shoe, and no socks!), and they look great! I love the color ❤️ You can really tighten them up with the way the cross straps work as well. And they perform great! I’m using them for indoor rock climbing, and I definitely trust my shoes. Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this shoe. She's an intermediate climber and decided to stop getting rentals each time she went and loves the feel of these. Snug but good fit and nice look too. She is a 7/7.5 in normal shoes, went a 1/2 size more to a 39 and it was perfect. I know these shoes say indoor, but she uses mostly indoor and some outdoor climbing.
customer_reviews.author: AlexyB

customer_reviews.title: They are supposed to be tight just not unbearable
customer_reviews.text: They’re climbing shoes. They’re supposed to be tight. These shoes to break in after a few weeks and are super comfy to wear for hours. But if you’re getting these as a beginner shoe please note they shouldn’t be as comfy as gym shoes but you shouldn’t be so uncomfortable that you’re in pain. These are a great beginner shoe. I wear a size 7 in street shoe and I wear size 6 (size 38) in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Short

customer_reviews.title: The straps make it easy to release the feet when resting and putting the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for a couple of months now and I have absolutely no complaints. I am a V3-V4 boulder enthusiast, started 6 months ago and have been climbing 3 times a week. The straps make it easy to release the feet when resting and putting the shoes back on fast to go send another problem. I see many people in my gym wearing these, but in different colors. I recommend La Sportiva!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernanda Alves da Silva

customer_reviews.title: As a beginner to intermediate climber, I find these shoes to be just right.
customer_reviews.text: I bought La Sportiva Oxygym Climbing Shoe to use in the rock gym. As a beginner to intermediate climber, I find these shoes to be just right. They fit true to size, are comfortable, and provide good grip and support while climbing. The velcro straps make it easy to slip on and off and allow you to adjust the straps to fit your feet comfortably. I have not experienced any blisters as with other pairs of shoes and I have been wearing for a couple months now. The shoes are washable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mu

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but runs small...even for climbing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes but they are at least a size too small. This makes them very uncomfortable since climbing shoes are typically worn tight anyway. Unfortunately Amazon didn't have a bigger size, so I have to return them and buy elsewhere. I went and tried them on in store and really liked the next larger size. I haven't climbed in them yet, but I'll update once I do. I'm a beginner so these are fine for me even though they don't appear to be very aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Clotheschic

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner shoe. I like the colors on these, and the velcro straps are nice. They're not too aggressive for a beginner, but still has a some arch. I have pretty wide feet - I got a size 37 and I wear a size women's 6 in regular shoes. I would not be able to size down - they are very snug on my feet. I feel like they run narrow, I wish I would have gotten a 37.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Michelle

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES these shoes. Christmas present for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: She LOVES these shoes. Christmas present for my daughter who recently started rock climbing. Fit perfectly (she asked for 1/2 size smaller than she wears in regular shoes). She was very excited about this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, definitely have to wear them in a bit
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because they are so so so uncomfortable. But they do what they’re supposed to do, I am able to climb much more efficiently than I could when using the rental shoes from the gym. I ordered a size 39 (7.5 in women’s, my regular shoe size) and they fit very snug. However, after a few climbs, they have begun to wear in somewhat. And a plus, they are really very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE 'em!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo absolutely loves these shoes! As a person who climbs regularly throughout the week, she has expressed nothing but pure comfort for the hours she is in the shoes. At first they were a little tight but as soon as she started using them, she said they broke in quickly and she absolutely loves them now. When I get home, looks like I shall be getting the same pair for me. (though definitely in a more sane color pattern-glad my kiddo likes these colors but hmmm....) :)
customer_reviews.author: blueocean*

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 3 hours of indoor climbing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My daughter wore these climbing three times indoor for an hour each time. The shoe has already ripped. The sole is separating from the shoe. Terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe&Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for beginners. True to size
customer_reviews.text: I am new to climbing and had a really hard time trying to decide what shoes to get. Based on other reviews, I sized up but found them to be too big and reordered in my normal size. I received them today and they fit great. I’ve climbed a few times in them and they give me a lot more confidence on small holds and smearing. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of the shoes. I wear between a 7.5 and 8 in women's shoes. After reading reviews I was nervous about what size to buy. I purchased an 8, the shoes are actually a bit too big, nothing too bad, but small enough that I could not order a size smaller. They are a bit slippery but I imaging that will go away once I've broken them in. Overall, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, easy to break in, I love them for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been gym climbing with these for the last few months and really like them. Took a few climbs to break in as expected and fit as expected if you know how to size correctly! I like the Velcro laces to get a great tight fit. Good little gym shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse & Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wear 6 in sneakers and i got this 6.5and fit me perfectly. I love the color and its very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: so ra han

customer_reviews.title: La Sportiva Oxygym Climbing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: For what I understand, these shoes are supposed to be snug, and they are! not small, snug! it will take a couple of sessions on the wall in order to feel comfortable otherwise. Since I have not used them, I will give them 4 stars in the look and feel of the shoe. I'm a size 37, bought a size 38
customer_reviews.author: Amcd19

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: New to climbing so this is my first pair of shoes. So much better than the rental shoes. Instantly improved my climbing!! I especially like how the strap adjusts to tighten around the arch of my foot. Given me greater stability and makes me trust the small footholds more! And they look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F morse

customer_reviews.title: Best first pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I happened upon this pair during a sale and was just convinced by the colorway. I was searching for a durable, good shoe for indoor climbing. I'm just a beginner, but these work great for me! I like that they have velcro instead of laces for easy (and lazy) on and off. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice shoe to start climbing in.
customer_reviews.author: mewonthefreeway

customer_reviews.title: Great climbing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. Initially, I thought I had ordered too small but they just needed broken in a but. They fit well and provide great grip for climbing. I love the velcro for easy removal as well as secure, adjustable fastening. And they're super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Go big
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes but they are super super small. I got my typical size and well, lets just say my feet requested a larger size. I believe they run small and should be purchased a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Shianti Lee

customer_reviews.title: I like how the one strap is controlled by two velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well (climbing shoes are supposed to feel a bit small). I like how the one strap is controlled by two velcro snaps, as opposed to there being two separate straps. It's easy to control the tightness of the shoe since there are two velcro snaps as well. Quality is good and the package came a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and form fitting. They worked so much better than the ones they let you rent at the gym. Plus they are vegan!
customer_reviews.author: NJH

customer_reviews.title: A little tighter, but get comfy!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller fit than most of the other climbing shoes I have wore in the same eu size. But they adjust and are a bit more comfortable once you have them on for a minute. I mostly just belay, but they felt perfect on the wall and slab. Great beining shoe for sure! Velcro makes them fast on and off, with two points of contact and the z style strap, they are plenty adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: ... fit was to small for me but they seem like they would be great climbing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the fit was to small for me but they seem like they would be great climbing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet and a beginer climber
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to climbing and these were recommended for wide feet! I was worried that they would be too small but they are perfect! I normally wear a street shoe between 5-6 US. I ordered a 5.5 US and they fit snug but perfect for climbing. I can climb and belay for hours without needing to take my shoes off like I've had to do with rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is tricky
customer_reviews.text: Great! Work well once we got the right size. Size in shoe does not go a long with size chart..
customer_reviews.author: R . Thomas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Perfect for gym climbing!
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon size chart listed EU 37 as a size 6, so I ordered it since I am a size 6.5 and climbing shoes are supposed to fit snug. When they came I was worried because the label said EU 37 / size 5. Turns out they work really well this tight for climbing - although I wouldn't want to walk around in them any more than I had to. Love the fit and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have heard wonderful things about this brand but about two months after ...
customer_reviews.text: I have heard wonderful things about this brand but about two months after I bought the shoes, I had holes in the top of the toe of both shoes. I do climb very consistently and these are the only shoes I have been wearing indoor and out but my last shoes were 5.10s and I didn't get a hole in the toes for over a year. Disappointed in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Discolored toe on brand new shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these, the fit, the Velcro, but to pay this much and have them arrive noticeably discolored I was a bit bummed.
customer_reviews.author: mmebijoux

customer_reviews.title: Confusing sizing
customer_reviews.text: Confusing sizing. I wear 6.5 in street shoes, ordered 38.5 which is about size 8. The shoes fit perfect but confusingly the actually shoes says it’s 6.5 on the inside (see picture)
customer_reviews.author: B. nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Washable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect based on the chart. The heal does not dig into my skin like the other styles do and its washable!
customer_reviews.author: Kenbridge

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look good but the size of shoes does not match size ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good but the size of shoes does not match size chart in amazon. I usually wear size 5 of US , and I purchased a size 36 of this shoes(according to size chart of amazon it is US 5.5). But when I check the label on shoes, it turns out to be a size 4.5. A whole size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelps

customer_reviews.title: Great intermediate shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very rigid shoes, great traction. Great intermediate shoe. Not too aggressive, not to flimsy. The rigidity is the best part. Placing my foot feels very firm and secure. Great for indoor gym practices and meets. I do wish the webbing was a little shorter. When I tighten them, I generally find that the shoe isn't as tight as I want it to be when I run out of velcro for the latches.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfortable when climbing. Love the Velcro straps - makes it easier to slip on and off between climbs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors just got them to small go up a size
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy climbing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight, awesome climbing shoe. Used indoors only and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Mead

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - sole started separating from shoe after 3 weeks of climbing
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality - sole started separating from shoe after 3 weeks of climbing
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! I normally wear a size larger in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I normally wear a size larger in my Nago La Sportivas, so I initially had to return my purchase and get a full smaller size. They fit nice and snug and have so much traction! The arch isn't too intense, but perfect for indoor climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They came fast and feel great! I am usaully a size 6
customer_reviews.text: They came fast and feel great! I am usaully a size 6.5 climbing shoe (cause I have wider feet.) but I tried my luck and went a half size larger. They are very smooshy, but I am positive I will break into them then have the fit I need. They are supposed to be a bit uncomfortable at first anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my daughter for Christmas. She loved everything about them, the fit, color and velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome shoe can't wait to get out and climb this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Finney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but the sizing is off had to return.
customer_reviews.author: love mysteries

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 7.5 and went down to a 6.5 and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Eichler

customer_reviews.title: Pythagoras...here I come!
customer_reviews.text: I think climbing shoes have to be a tad tight so this size should be the ticket. I'm climbing a mountain in the summer on an island in Greece! Hope these shoes make it an amazing experience!
customer_reviews.author: C. ALEXIOU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes just a little small. Very easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of climbing shoes. No complaints, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Rom

customer_reviews.title: So I went for size 38 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I know these shoes are suppose to fit tight, but the first pair was my normal size, 37.5, and my toes curled up. So I went for size 38 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tooooooooooo small size chart is way out
customer_reviews.text: I checked size chat in this page and ordered usa 7size but i got a usa 6size shoses. it is too much tight for me. even i ordered in korea. so i can't change the size easily. so annoying 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to break these bad girls in
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Tight but not unbearable! Can't wait to break these bad girls in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and precise
customer_reviews.text: Best climbing shoes I own, very comfortable, I keep ordering the same ones every year
customer_reviews.author: diana Avalos

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of climbing shoes and I love them! They are so comfy and awesome. Little tight at first but broke them in the first couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McNair

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LA SPORTIVA
customer_reviews.text: These are the best climbing shoes I have ever owned. Totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just sizing is different and they didn't make that clear so the ones I ordered were way too small
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great beginner climbing shoes! Very comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As should be
customer_reviews.text: They grip great and the fit is as you need it to be. Rock climbing shoes should be slightly snug by your toes. You don't feel it when your climbing. In fact it helps. They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: but not at all painful.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought these in my usual size (6/37) but they were painfully small. I exchanged for a size up (7/38) and these are just snug enough for my toes to touch the front with a slight curl, but not at all painful.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: After couple day of wearing the shoes were adjusted to my feet well and turned out pretty comportable. Ill probably buy one size
customer_reviews.text: It was my first climbing shoes. I normally wear 7 for regular shoes and bought 38M. It was very uncomfortable at the beginning -my toes were slightly curling- so I thought I bought a wrong size but I found that climbing shoes were supposed yo be uncomfortable. After couple day of wearing the shoes were adjusted to my feet well and turned out pretty comportable. Ill probably buy one size smaller for next time but as a beginner this shoes were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe; I've received many compliments on the aesthetics of these. Comfortable for a longer climb. I wear an 8 in a street shoe and sized down to a 38.5. Very snug but not excruciating--perfect for climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lavigueur

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great for a beginner rock climber
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for a beginner rock climber. I had a different pair of climbing shoes, but they were so tight and painful, it was hard for me to focus on anything else. I wear an 8 1/2 shoe, and I intentionally ordered a larger size that I can even wear with socks (size 40.5). I know this is not ideal for rock climbing, but at least my feet are comfortable. Had I ordered according to the size chart, I think they would be true to size without socks. I would only recommend these for a beginner rock climber. A stiffer shoe would definitely be needed for more advanced climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: I suggest getting your normal shoe size! It worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, which is my normal shoe size, and the fit is snug without making my toes curl under. I personally appreciate the velcro strap style; it allows for more adjustability in the overall tightness of the shoe. I am new to climbing and am no expert at how these sorts of shoes are supposed to fit for the professional, but I am very comfortable in them and they seem like a perfect starting shoe. They also look pretty cool! I have used them twice now and suspect they won't take too long to break. Climbing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Steenwyk

customer_reviews.title: I took half a size bigger than my size. ...
customer_reviews.text: I took half a size bigger than my size. But it was way too small. My mistake was that I used another courier service to ship it to Dubai so now can't exchange it with another size.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Al Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes! Fit perfectly and look great. They're also incredibly light.
customer_reviews.author: Madi Beebe

customer_reviews.title: She loved them. States they fit well and are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and bought these for my daughter as a gift. She loved them. States they fit well and are very comfortable for climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Berta4

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small, kinda looks cheaply made. You can see the glue.
customer_reviews.author: Aseel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are impossible to climb in.. Order 2 sizes smaller in the hopes of grappling a hold
customer_reviews.author: Luisa D. Schmitt

product_meta.title: La Sportiva Oxygym Climbing Shoe - Women39;s
product_meta.description: FEATURES of the La Sportiva Women's Oxygym Shoe 3 layer WashTex external fabric keeps the shoe clean and hygienic Internal breathable fabric allows for moisture wicking Super comfortable for extended use Patented hook and loop closure system allows personalized fit Ideal for gym climbing and all around climbing Highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes Completely washable
feature_bullets: 3-Layer WashTex external fabric keeps the shoe clean and hygienic
Internal breathable fabric allows for moisture wicking
Patented hook and loop closure system allows for a personalized fit
Ideal terrain: Gym climbing and all around climbing
